@SophcoCooper The best burritos I've ever had (I dream of it sometimes), definitely with good veggie options, was at La Taqueria - 2889 Mission St. I'd also recommend a drink in Vesuvios & focaccia from the Liguria bakery. If I remember others I'll message you - it's been a few years!
@SophcoCooper I have a few San Francisco tips I can dig out for you! Including the BEST burritos 🌯 💛🌯

@kariebookish It wasn’t easy! Especially vegetarian options. But had a couple of great meals in Grød and the lovely food market. Best was the design museum cafe - dreamt smørrebrød!

Another gem from the brilliant fashion gallery at @DesignmuseumDK, a beautifully quilted and lovingly mended hooded silk jacket and petticoat c.1770-80. #DressHistory #FashionHistory #Quilting https://t.co/PEhXWT7u4e
YES DR LAURA!! 🙌👏💛 https://t.co/e6xCzuWbzL
@kariebookish We also did the Glypotek and the workers museum which were also brilliant in very different ways!
@kariebookish @DesignmuseumDK We just stumbled upon it and I was totally blown away! The interpretation and display of the Islamic collection was just so incredibly well done. A real gem!

Probably the single most breathtaking object at the @DesignmuseumDK - the top layer & trim of this 1845-50 wedding dress was knitted! It shows such incredible skill. #DressHistory #FashionHistory #Knitting https://t.co/AbFKADIsUF

Had a great few days in Copenhagen, including some visits to brilliant museums! Highlights were the @DesignmuseumDK & Davids Samling. May need to do a blogpost/thread later to collect my thoughts 🇩🇰🏛🏺
